verbs.description: Trump [V: is] making a habit of referring to the military in possessive terms like " my generals " and " my military . "
[ARG0: Trump] is [V: making] [ARG1: a habit of referring to the military in possessive terms like " my generals " and " my military] . "
[ARG0: Trump] is making a habit of [V: referring] [ARG1: to the military] [ARGM-MNR: in possessive terms like " my generals " and " my military] . "
